definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: standing grain;—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ex 22:5 +; cstr. [[קָמַת]] De 23:26, De 23:26; pl. cstr. [[קָמוֹת]] Ju Jdg 15:5;—standing grain (mature) Ex 22:5 (E), De 16:9, De 23:26, De 23:26, Ju Jdg 15:5, Jdg 15:5, Is 17:5; ´[[לִפְנֵי ק]]: 2Ki 19:26 = Is 37:27 (i.e. before maturity); in fig. Ho 8:7.—Cf. Vogelst:Landwirthsch. 51
